author: mwrock
body: This is a continuation of #1801. I had to resubmit as a new PR since making my rivate repo public unlinked it from the powershell/powershell repo.

comments.body:

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

title: Remove misleading note about dotnet 1.0.1
